OctoDev.description: Gamified learning platform for programming. Master coding through interactive challenges, skill trees, and real-time feedback.

FlexyApi.description: A AI-powered API that simulates any rest API based on a simple description. Perfect for testing and prototyping without backend setup.

Silhouettle.description: Geography game where you guess the country based on its silhouette.

Periodic Table Game.description: Memorize the periodic table with this interactive quiz.

Forkify.description: A recipe search engine that allows users to find, save, and share their favorite recipes from around the web.
